full_summary:
# Telecommunication Shelter, Radio Frequency Antenna & Electrical Installation at the Mont Tanguay, Quebec Site

## Tender Details
- **Contract Title/French Title:** Installation d’abri de Télécommunication, d’antenne radiofréquence et électrique pour le site de Mont Tanguay, Québec
- **Contract Reference Number/Number de Référence:** cb-610-27655657
- **Amendment Number/Numéro de Modification:** 7
- **Solicitation Number/Number de Sollicitation:** 2023213296/A
- **Publication Date/Date de Publication:** 2023-10-16
- **Tender Closing Date/Appel d’Offres Date de Cloture:** 2023-10-31 14:00:00
- **Amendment Date/Date de Modification:** 2023-10-31

## Contract Summary
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a contractor for the construction of a Telecommunication Shelter, Radio Frequency antennas and electrical installation at the Mont Tanguay, Quebec site. This contract is a two-phase competition. In the first phase (Phase 1), bidders will be pre-qualified based on mandatory requirements. In the second phase (Phase 2), the qualified bidders will be invited to submit a financial bid for the project.

## Mandatory Requirements
- The contract includes mandatory requirements. Failure to comply may result in the rejection of the bid.
- The contractor must complete the work by March 31, 2024.
- There is a security requirement associated with this contract.
- A mandatory site visit is included in Phase 2 of the competition.
- Tenders must be submitted to the following email address: Charles.Langlois@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

## Contact Information
- Charles Langlois, RCMP Procurement & Contracting Branch
  - Email: Charles.Langlois@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
  - Phone: (514) 348-7156
- You can also visit the webpage: Canada Buys (http://www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders)

## Attachment
- The following documents are attached: [link to the attached documents]
